title: x/text/collate: recommends using nonexistent package locale instead
body:
The introductory comment for package golang.org/x/text/collate says "Package locale provides a high-level interface to collation. Users should typically use that package instead." However, AFAICT there is no package locale. This is a documentation error, and a minor one at that, but still might be worth fixing.

This applies to Go 1.6 and Go 1.7.
